attributes.action: reduce the amount sent overseas in Aid until the elderly and vulnerable have sufficient resources for care and dignity both in their own homes and care facilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly people should all have access to sufficiently funded services to ensure they receive the standard of care they need and deserve to enable them to live with dignity, and comfort. Continuing to send billions abroad in Aid when the indigenous population is suffering due to lack of funding is both offensive and against the wishes of a percentage of the population.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/LookafterNo1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
